[http://www.perl.com/pub/a/2001/06/13/recdecent.html|Parse::RecDescent Tutorial] is a little something I found this morning while groking [cpan://Parse::RecDescent] for use in a module I'm writing. Written by [http://www.perl.com/pub/au/Goff_Jeffrey|Jeffrey Goff] back on 13 June '01, seems easier to digest in a first sitting than the wonderful if highly prolix [cpan://Parse::RecDescent] pod.

[http://www.informatik.uni-trier.de/~smith/perl/recdescent/recdescent.html|Using Parse::RecDescent ] by Craig Smith via "Der Zweiter Perl Workshop" is another good resource I just started reading.

Even Big Blue got into the act with [http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/library/perl-parsing/|Parsing with Perl modules] by Teodor Zlatanov.
